when.test: status == 201 or status == 208 or status == 207 or status == 223 or status == 224

choose.when: SELECT CONCAT(`N_NAME`, `VUL_NAME`, `BLD_NUM`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, `N_NAME` `city`, `VUL_NAME` `street`, `BLD_NUM` `building` FROM `payment` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY `N_NAME`, `VUL_NAME`, `BLD_NUM`

SELECT CONCAT(`N_NAME`, `VUL_NAME`, `BLD_NUM`, `CORP_NUM`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, `N_NAME` `city`, `VUL_NAME` `street`, `BLD_NUM` `building`, `CORP_NUM` `buildingCorp` FROM `payment` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY `N_NAME`, `VUL_NAME`, `BLD_NUM`, `CORP_NUM`

SELECT CONCAT(`N_NAME`, `VUL_NAME`, `BLD_NUM`, `CORP_NUM`, `FLAT`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, `N_NAME` `city`, `VUL_NAME` `street`, `BLD_NUM` `building`, `CORP_NUM` `buildingCorp`, `FLAT` `apartment` FROM `payment` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY `N_NAME`, `VUL_NAME`, `BLD_NUM`, `CORP_NUM`, `FLAT`

mapper.sql: JOIN `request_file` bf ON b.`request_file_id` = bf.`id` JOIN `request_file` pf ON (bf.`group_id` = pf.`group_id` AND pf.`type` = 2) JOIN `payment` p ON (pf.`id` = p.`request_file_id` AND p.`OWN_NUM_SR` = b.`OWN_NUM_SR`)

when.test: status == 201 or status == 208 or status == 207 or status == 223 or status == 224

choose.when:
SELECT CONCAT(p.`N_NAME`, p.`VUL_NAME`, p.`BLD_NUM`) `id`, COUNT(DISTINCT b.id) `count`, p.`N_NAME` `city`, p.`VUL_NAME` `street`, p.`BLD_NUM` `building` FROM `benefit` b
WHERE b.`request_file_id` = #{id} AND b.`status` = #{status} GROUP BY p.`N_NAME`, p.`VUL_NAME`, p.`BLD_NUM`

SELECT CONCAT(p.`N_NAME`, p.`VUL_NAME`, p.`BLD_NUM`, p.`CORP_NUM`) `id`, COUNT(DISTINCT b.id) `count`, p.`N_NAME` `city`, p.`VUL_NAME` `street`, p.`BLD_NUM` `building`, p.`CORP_NUM` `buildingCorp` FROM `benefit` b
WHERE b.`request_file_id` = #{id} AND b.`status` = #{status} GROUP BY p.`N_NAME`, p.`VUL_NAME`, p.`BLD_NUM`, p.`CORP_NUM`

SELECT CONCAT(p.`N_NAME`, p.`VUL_NAME`, p.`BLD_NUM`, p.`CORP_NUM`, p.`FLAT`) `id`, COUNT(DISTINCT b.id) `count`, p.`N_NAME` `city`, p.`VUL_NAME` `street`, p.`BLD_NUM` `building`, p.`CORP_NUM` `buildingCorp`, p.`FLAT` `apartment` FROM `benefit` b
WHERE b.`request_file_id` = #{id} AND b.`status` = #{status} GROUP BY p.`N_NAME`, p.`VUL_NAME`, p.`BLD_NUM`, p.`CORP_NUM`, p.`FLAT`

when.test: status == 201 or status == 237 or status == 208 or status == 207 or status == 223 or status == 224

choose.when: SELECT CONCAT(`N_NAME`, `VUL_CAT`, `VUL_NAME`, `BLD_NUM`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, `N_NAME`, `VUL_CAT`, `VUL_NAME`, `BLD_NUM` FROM `actual_payment` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

SELECT CONCAT(`N_NAME`, `VUL_CAT`, `VUL_NAME`, `BLD_NUM`, `CORP_NUM`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, `N_NAME`, `VUL_CAT`, `VUL_NAME`, `BLD_NUM`, `CORP_NUM` FROM `actual_payment` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

SELECT CONCAT(`N_NAME`, `VUL_CAT`, `VUL_NAME`, `BLD_NUM`, `CORP_NUM`, `FLAT`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, `N_NAME`, `VUL_CAT`, `VUL_NAME`, `BLD_NUM`, `CORP_NUM`, `FLAT` FROM `actual_payment` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

SELECT TO_CYRILLIC(`FIO`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, TO_CYRILLIC(`first_name`) first_name, TO_CYRILLIC(`middle_name`) middle_name, TO_CYRILLIC(`last_name`) last_name, TO_CYRILLIC(`FIO`) FIO FROM `subsidy` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

when.test: status == 201 or status == 237 or status == 208 or status == 207 or status == 223 or status == 224

choose.when: SELECT TO_CYRILLIC(CONCAT(`NP_NAME`, `CAT_V`, `NAME_V`)) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, TO_CYRILLIC(`NP_NAME`) NP_NAME, TO_CYRILLIC(`CAT_V`) CAT_V, TO_CYRILLIC(`NAME_V`) NAME_V FROM `subsidy` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

SELECT TO_CYRILLIC(CONCAT(`NP_NAME`, `CAT_V`, `NAME_V`, `BLD`)) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, TO_CYRILLIC(`NP_NAME`) NP_NAME, TO_CYRILLIC(`CAT_V`) CAT_V, TO_CYRILLIC(`NAME_V`) NAME_V, TO_CYRILLIC(`BLD`) BLD FROM `subsidy` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

SELECT TO_CYRILLIC(CONCAT(`NP_NAME`, `CAT_V`, `NAME_V`, `BLD`, `CORP`)) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, TO_CYRILLIC(`NP_NAME`) NP_NAME, TO_CYRILLIC(`CAT_V`) CAT_V, TO_CYRILLIC(`NAME_V`) NAME_V, TO_CYRILLIC(`BLD`) BLD, TO_CYRILLIC(`CORP`) CORP FROM `subsidy` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

SELECT TO_CYRILLIC(CONCAT(`NP_NAME`, `CAT_V`, `NAME_V`, `BLD`, `CORP`, `FLAT`)) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, TO_CYRILLIC(`NP_NAME`) NP_NAME, TO_CYRILLIC(`CAT_V`) CAT_V, TO_CYRILLIC(`NAME_V`) NAME_V, TO_CYRILLIC(`BLD`) BLD, TO_CYRILLIC(`CORP`) CORP, TO_CYRILLIC(`FLAT`) FLAT FROM `subsidy` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

SELECT `FIO` `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, TO_CYRILLIC(`first_name`) first_name, TO_CYRILLIC(`middle_name`) middle_name, TO_CYRILLIC(`last_name`) last_name, TO_CYRILLIC(`FIO`) FIO FROM `dwelling_characteristics` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

SELECT CONCAT(st.`KLKUL_CODE`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, TO_CYRILLIC(st.`KLKUL_NAME`) KLKUL_NAME FROM `dwelling_characteristics` d LEFT JOIN `facility_street_reference` s ON `CDUL` = s.`KL_CODEUL` LEFT JOIN `facility_street_type_reference` st on st.`KLKUL_CODE` = s.`KL_CODEKUL` WHERE d.`request_file_id` = #{id} AND d.`status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

when.test: status == 201 or status == 208 or status == 207 or status == 224

choose.when: SELECT CONCAT(`CDUL`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, CDUL, (select TO_CYRILLIC(KLKUL_NAME) from facility_street_reference left join facility_street_type_reference on KLKUL_CODE = KL_CODEKUL where `CDUL` = `KL_CODEUL` limit 1) KLKUL_NAME, (select TO_CYRILLIC(`KL_NAME`) from facility_street_reference where `CDUL` = `KL_CODEUL` limit 1) KL_NAME FROM `dwelling_characteristics` d WHERE d.`request_file_id` = #{id} AND d.`status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

SELECT CONCAT(`CDUL`, `HOUSE`) `id`, COUNT(*) `count`, (select TO_CYRILLIC(KLKUL_NAME) from facility_street_reference left join facility_street_type_reference on KLKUL_CODE = KL_CODEKUL where `CDUL` = `KL_CODEUL` limit 1) KLKUL_NAME, (select TO_CYRILLIC(`KL_NAME`) from facility_street_reference where `CDUL` = `KL_CODEUL` limit 1) KL_NAME FROM `dwelling_characteristics` d WHERE d.`request_file_id` = #{id} AND d.`status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

SELECT CONCAT(`CDUL`, `HOUSE`, `BUILD`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, (select TO_CYRILLIC(KLKUL_NAME) from facility_street_reference left join facility_street_type_reference on KLKUL_CODE = KL_CODEKUL where `CDUL` = `KL_CODEUL` limit 1) KLKUL_NAME, (select TO_CYRILLIC(`KL_NAME`) from facility_street_reference where `CDUL` = `KL_CODEUL` limit 1) KL_NAME, `CDUL`, `HOUSE`, `BUILD` FROM `dwelling_characteristics` d LEFT JOIN `facility_street_reference` s ON `CDUL` = s.`KL_CODEUL` LEFT JOIN `facility_street_type_reference` st on st.`KLKUL_CODE` = s.`KL_CODEKUL` WHERE d.`request_file_id` = #{id} AND d.`status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

SELECT CONCAT(`CDUL`, `HOUSE`, `BUILD`, `APT`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, (select TO_CYRILLIC(KLKUL_NAME) from facility_street_reference left join facility_street_type_reference on KLKUL_CODE = KL_CODEKUL where `CDUL` = `KL_CODEUL` limit 1) KLKUL_NAME, (select TO_CYRILLIC(`KL_NAME`) from facility_street_reference where `CDUL` = `KL_CODEUL` limit 1) KL_NAME, `CDUL`, `HOUSE`, `BUILD`, `APT` FROM `dwelling_characteristics` d WHERE d.`request_file_id` = #{id} AND d.`status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

SELECT `FIO` `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, TO_CYRILLIC(`first_name`), TO_CYRILLIC(`middle_name`), TO_CYRILLIC(`last_name`), TO_CYRILLIC(`FIO`) FROM `facility_service_type` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1

when.test: status == 201 or status == 237 or status == 208 or status == 207 or status == 223 or status == 224

choose.when: SELECT CONCAT(`CDUL`, `HOUSE`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, `CDUL`, `HOUSE` FROM `facility_service_type` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1
SELECT CONCAT(`CDUL`, `HOUSE`, `BUILD`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, `CDUL`, `HOUSE`, `BUILD` FROM `facility_service_type` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1
SELECT CONCAT(`CDUL`, `HOUSE`, `BUILD`, `APT`) `id`, COUNT(1) `count`, `CDUL`, `HOUSE`, `BUILD`, `APT` FROM `facility_service_type` WHERE `request_file_id` = #{id} AND `status` = #{status} GROUP BY 1
